HOW TO PLAY 

A       =  to move left

D        = move right

Space         = jump

F                =  shoot

M           = switch between weapons you have

Z              =   zoom out the camera 

Esc        =   to pause  

note  : YOU can perform wall climb  by pressing   A or D  when u sticky to wall and suddenly  press Space key
